description: Debug faster with AI agents that access video recordings, console logs, and network requests
author: Jam
content: Access Jam bug recordings and debug information to troubleshoot issues more efficiently.
features: Review error messages and stack traces

steps: Add the Jam server configuration with HTTP transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport http jam https://mcp.jam.dev/mcp

useCases: Debug production issues with full context

troubleshooting.solution: Check the documentation for detailed troubleshooting steps.
